data.name: Oil Rush OST
data.detailed_description:
18 tracks of the original music composed by Paralyzah for Oil Rush naval strategy game, plus a bonus drum'n'bass track Blood money!



Paralyzah (Mike Kondratyev) is known for his drum'n'bass releases, that were published on a lot of labels, including Covert Operations, Total Advance Music, Respect Rec. His neurofunk tracks have
a deep and techy mood with a dark ambient atmosphere.



Feel the vibe of the post-apocalyptic world with this unique fusion of heavy industrial groove and electronic ambient/breaks tracks!



Track List:



  1. 5th hour 01:48
  2. Arctic breeze 02:50
  3. Broken tanker 02:22
  4. Clouds march 04:08
  5. Cold war 03:20
  6. Drift 02:07
  7. Fast expansion 02:46
  8. Good morning 01:46
  9. Hammerhead 01:53
  10. Hard rain 03:33
  11. Heat war 01:35
  12. Lost land 02:33
  13. Nabat 03:11
  14. Navigation 03:18
  15. Sea walker 02:27
  16. Twin-barrel machine gun 02:59
  17. Underwater 02:15
  18. Water death squad 02:46
  19. [bonus] Blood money 02:33


Format: MP3, stereo, 44100 Hz, 256 kbp/s.



Songs will be placed in your Oil Rush folder in the Steam Directory:

PC \Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\Common\Oil Rush\ost
Mac \Users"user_name"\Library\Application Support\Steam\SteamApps\Common\Oil Rush\ost
